name: Fixed aspect ratio images with variants
description:
Aspect ratios are hard with image fills, so the trick to making them work is to define your breakpoints and create variants for each image!


With this approach, you can drag the components into your designs and use auto layout, because the image dimensions are fixed.


If you'd like to create fully flexible and "responsive" images, you may need to employ a hack to make it work. This is hack-free...enjoy!
